function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Impact of COVID-19 on construction industry","Impact":"Severe curtailment of economic activities, job cuts, and halted construction work","Mitigation":"Implementing safety protocols, remote work, and economic stimulus measures","Technologies":"Remote collaboration tools, construction site monitoring technology, and virtual project management","People":"Builders, construction workers, employees, and contractors","Owner":"Government, construction companies, and industry organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of study on the impact of pandemic on construction industry","Impact":"Insufficient understanding of the effects of the pandemic on the industry","Mitigation":"Conducting in-depth research and analysis to uncover the effects of the pandemic","Technologies":"Data analytics, survey tools, and research methodologies","People":"Researchers, industry experts, and policymakers","Owner":"Research organizations, government, and industry associations"},{"Description":"Effect on GDP and economic stability","Impact":"Contribution of construction industry to GDP declines, affecting overall economic stability","Mitigation":"Implementing economic recovery strategies, infrastructure projects, and employment support","Technologies":"Economic modeling tools, infrastructure planning software, and employment management platforms","People":"Economists, policymakers, and government officials","Owner":"Government, financial institutions, and economic development agencies"}]}
